job_title: Senior Software Developer - C#, .Net 8, Angular, Azure
job_purpose: To lead specific project initiatives, develop work products, mentor junior developers, and contribute to consulting projects using cutting-edge technologies like .Net 8, Angular, and Azure.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Develop work products and lead project initiatives
Mentor junior developers and conduct peer reviews
Ensure best practices are met in software development
Receive quarterly pay increases based on performance
required_qualifications: Minimum of 7 years' experience in .Net development
company_details: An award-winning tech consultancy specializing in Ai Software and workforce solutions, operating 100% remotely. Distinguished Microsoft partner focusing on Digital Applications innovation on Azure. Offers opportunities for personal development, company-paid certifications, and a supportive, inclusive culture.
